name: Chicken Francaise
recipeInstructions: 1. Slice the chicken breast into thin wide strips. Flatten with a meat tenderizer.
2. Lightly beat the eggs in a medium glass bowl.
3. Dip the chicken in the flour, then into the egg, leaving in the bowl.
4. Put some butter in a frying pan over a medium heat.
5 When the butter is foaming add the chicken.
6. Sprinkle the parmesan over the chicken and some parsley.
7. After a couple of minutes flip turn.
8. Add some crushed garlic to the pan.
9. When the chicken is cooked remove it from the pan, then reduce the sauce for  few more seconds.
